text: 3.18 Snd 11.18, Ais 32.17, Mat 5.9, Plp 1.11, Hib 12.11 Anɨb ak nɨm, binɨb kɨmɨgel mɨdtep gɨpal okok, kɨli binɨb tap yɨŋ yɨbal tek mɨdebal. Binɨb tap yɨŋ yɨmel, jak awl gɨl, mɨdup teplep pulup. Anɨb ak tek nep binɨb kɨmɨgel mɨdtep gɨpal okok, kɨli anɨgel, binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl God agak tek kɨdek gɨpal.
